abstract: Federal security Chief Commissioner Alfredo Castillo for Michoacan State says Mexican troops and police fought with armed civilians in Apatzingan, and nine civilians were killed.
lead_paragraph: Federal troops and police officers clashed Tuesday with armed civilians in a western city, and nine civilians were killed, the federal security chief for Michoacán State said.
snippet: Federal troops and police officers clashed Tuesday with armed civilians in a western city, and nine civilians were killed, the federal security chief for Michoacán State said.
